trends: There have been no other sightings in Knox
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: it was dark in color moved rapiley disk shape it would go from flying flat to up on edge
divs: Sighting DetailsI was unloading corn in the grain bin, I looked up to check the sight glass at the top of the bin. Thats when I noticed this object in the sky at first I thought it might have been a helicopter it was high off in the distance. But all of a sudden it was over us at a lower level thats when I realized it wasn't a plane or bird, it was a differnt object without sound. I yelled to my wife and mother look up WHAT IS THIS THING? It appeared to be a dark in color, flat and disc shape. We watched it travel over us it appeared at times to have traveled in different positions. (from flat to on edge). It had no sound or any noticable lighting. It was around 5:30 pm on Tuesday October 30th 2007. The weather was clear. It route of travel seemed to be from south to north. It all of a sudden rapidly took off in the northern direction. Total observation experience was approx. 2 minutes.
